png

Class TextEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • png.TextEntry

  • public class TextEntry
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a textual metadata entry within a PNG textual chunk, consisting of a chunk type, keyword, and associated text value. Typically used to store entries from textual chunks, specifically tEXt, iTXt, or zTXt.
    Since:
    13 November 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ChunkType getChunkType()
      Returns the chunk type associated with this entry.
      java.lang.String getKeyword()
      Returns the keyword for this entry.

      Returns the text value associated with this entry.

      Returns a formatted string representation of this text entry.

        Constructs a TextEntry with a PNG chunk type, keyword, and associated text value.
        Parameters:
        type - indicates the PNG chunk type
        keyword - the keyword name identifying the entry
        text - the text value associated with the keyword
